workflows.prompt:
@[Question-1 Product/Feature URL](guide-url-input)

Extract only: product name, key features (max 5), and main use cases (max 3). Keep response under 500 words.

workflows.script:
# Python script to parse and structure key topics
def main():
    topics_str = data.get('key-topics-input', '').strip()
    
    if not topics_str:
        return "No topics provided"
    
    # Split topics by comma or newline
    topics = [t.strip() for t in topics_str.replace('\n', ',').split(',') if t.strip()]
    
    # Limit to 5 topics to avoid prompt overload
    topics = topics[:5]
    
    # Format as simple list
    result = ', '.join(topics)
    
    return result

if __name__ == "__main__":
    output = main()
    print(output)

workflows.script:
# Combine all guide sections into one document
def main():
    title = data.get('guide-title-input', 'Guide')
    introduction = data.get('step-4-generate-introduction', '')
    main_content = data.get('step-5-generate-main-content', '')
    conclusion = data.get('step-6-generate-conclusion', '')
    prerequisites = data.get('prerequisites-input', '')
    
    # Build the complete guide
    guide = f"# {title}\n\n"
    
    # Add introduction
    if introduction:
        guide += introduction + "\n\n"
    
    # Add prerequisites if provided
    if prerequisites:
        guide += "## Prerequisites\n\n"
        guide += prerequisites + "\n\n"
    
    # Add main content
    if main_content:
        guide += main_content + "\n\n"
    
    # Add conclusion
    if conclusion:
        guide += conclusion + "\n\n"
    
    # Add metadata footer
    guide_type = data.get('guide-type-input', 'Guide')
    audience = data.get('target-audience-input', 'All users')
    guide += "\n---\n\n"
    guide += f"*Guide Type: {guide_type} | Target Audience: {audience}*\n"
    
    return guide

if __name__ == "__main__":
    output = main()
    print(output)
